subject: Athletics and Sports
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Medical tests to determine the cause of death of the left-handed pitcher Joe Kennedy are expected to take about six to eight weeks.Results of Kennedy’s autopsy are pending the completion of the tests, the forensic investigator Amanda Whidden said yesterday. She is with Hillsborough County’s medical examiner’s office in Florida.Kennedy, who pitched for three major league teams last season, died at his in-laws’ home Friday at age 28.
